author: .paulharris
content:
still on getAttesterDuties, (ref https://ethereum.github.io/eth2.0-APIs/#/Validator/getAttesterDuties)
none of the fields are marked nullable, but my guess is the expectation of a validator that's exited would be you'll get the pubkey, then all nulls?
